body_html: I wasn't asking a broad question. I was asking how can I pass the gradients down to the lower layers of the pre trained Inception Model. Only the last layers are retrained, how can I retrain the lower layers of an existing model ?

body: I wasn't asking a broad question. I was asking how can I pass the gradients down to the lower layers of the pre trained Inception Model. Only the last layers are retrained, how can I retrain the lower layers of an existing model ?
